page.title: 15THAT'S LIFE AT COMMONSIDE
page.content: BEING A FARMER'S WIFE WITH TWO YOUNG CHILDREN, LIVING IN A LARGE, DRAUGHTY, VICTORIAN HOUSE, MUCH OF MY TIME IS SPENT IN & AROUND THE KITCHEN. THANKS TO AN AUTOMATIC WASHING MACHINE PLUMBED IN TO OUR WATER SUPPLY (WHICH COMES FROM A SPRING ON THE HILL), I CAN TACKLE TWO CHORES AT ONCE eg. WASHING & COOKING. A FOOD PROCESSOR & MIXER/LIQUIDISER ARE INVALUABLE AIDS IN FOOD PREPARATION PRIOR TO COOKING OR BAKING IN OR ON OUR 4-OVENED, OIL FIRED AGA - FISH FINGERS GRILLED IN THE HOTTEST OVEN DON'T SMELL! OUR WATER IS HEATED BY AN ANCIENT SOLID FUEL (COKE) BOILER WHICH STANDS IN THE KITCHEN. IT HEATS 3 TOWEL RAILS UPSTAIRS. OPEN FIRES IN THE DININGROOM DRAWINGROOM & STUDY & ELECTRIC OR CALOR GAS HEATERS ARE OUR ONLY OTHER FORMS OF HEATING. THERMAL UNDERWEAR IS ESSENTIAL IN OUR HOUSEHOLD!
